code: @Test public void testSetFaultFinally() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:a").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:b").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:c").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     template.requestBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").doTry().to("mock:a").setFaultBody(constant("Failed at A")).doFinally().to("mock:b").to("mock:c").end().to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").doTry().to("mock:a").setFaultBody(constant("Failed at A")).doFinally().to("mock:b").to("mock:c").end().to("mock:result").         }     }. }
